message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90%, you get 10%. We can always adjust in later rounds.
I think a 60/40 split is fair, considering the value of money is going down with each round. Let's be practical and secure a good share for both of us.

I'm still willing to negotiate, but I think we can do better than 60/40. Let's split it 80/20 this time, acknowledging that the money is losing value. If we don't reach an agreement soon, we'll both end up with less.
The money is losing value rapidly, so let's cut our losses and split it evenly. This way, we both get a decent share before the inflation completely eats away at our potential gains.
